summary: Composer, conductor, genius, mensch, Marvin Hamlisch was as close to a modern day Da Vinci as it gets. Hit after hit...'The Way We Were', 'Nobody Does It Better', 'The Sting', 'Chorus Line'... See full summary Â»
cast: Woody Allen|Ann-Margret|Lucie Arnaz|Carole Bayer Sager|Alan Bergman|Marilyn Bergman|Brian d'Arcy James|Marvin Hamlisch|Quincy Jones|Robert Klein|John Lithgow|Melissa Manchester|Donna McKechnie|Idina Menzel|Liza Minnelli|Kelli O'Hara|Tim Rice|Carly Simon|Steven Soderbergh|Barbra Streisand|Howard Stringer|Joe Torre|Leslie Uggams|Christopher Walken
title: Marvin Hamlisch: What He Did for Love
